overview: Nacho the Chihuahua is in for the surprise of his life when he and his turbulent girlfriend El Ni√±a run away from home to find Nacho's homeland, South of the Border. Their quest for adventure turns to danger when the two become targets of a gang of wild dogs. It's a rollercoaster ride of emotions as the pair find themselves closer to their homeland, but further from the ones they love. This is not-cho ordinary puppy adventure!
title: Nacho Chihuahua
